title: Elevenlabs-Mcp-Server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that integrates with ElevenLabs text-to-speech API for generating and managing voiceover tasks using a SQLite storage backend and a sample SvelteKit-based UI.
creator: mamertofabian

ELEVENLABS_API_KEY.description: Your ElevenLabs API key for authentication

ELEVENLABS_VOICE_ID.description: The ID of the voice you want to use

ELEVENLABS_MODEL_ID.description: The ElevenLabs model ID for generating voiceovers

ELEVENLABS_STABILITY.description: The stability setting for ElevenLabs voice generation

ELEVENLABS_SIMILARITY_BOOST.description: The similarity boost setting for ElevenLabs voice generation

ELEVENLABS_STYLE.description: The style setting for ElevenLabs voice generation

ELEVENLABS_OUTPUT_DIR.description: The directory where generated audio files will be saved
